languages.text: Нельзя позволить друкари уничтожить судно с ценным грузом. Торговцу нужна военная поддержка.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Не позволить друкхари уничтожить торговый корабль.

languages.text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.
languages.original_text: Нельзя позволить друкари уничтожить судно с ценным грузом. Торговцу нужна военная поддержка.

traits.locale_text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.
The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.
The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.

languages.text: 决不能放任黑暗灵族摧毁载有珍贵货物的虚空舰，必须立刻对那位商人提供军事救援。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.

traits.locale_text: 决不能放任黑暗灵族摧毁载有珍贵货物的虚空舰，必须立刻对那位商人提供军事救援。

languages.text: 貴重な貨物を輸送しているヴォイドシップをデュカーリが破壊するなど許されてはならない。軍で商人を支援する必要がある。
languages.original_text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.

traits.locale_text: 貴重な貨物を輸送しているヴォイドシップをデュカーリが破壊するなど許されてはならない。軍で商人を支援する必要がある。

languages.text: No puedes permitir que los Drukhari destruyan una nave cargada de mercancía valiosa. El mercader necesita apoyo militar.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.

traits.locale_text: No puedes permitir que los Drukhari destruyan una nave cargada de mercancía valiosa. El mercader necesita apoyo militar.

languages.text: Die Drukhari dürfen auf keinen Fall ein Raumschiff mit wertvoller Fracht an Bord zerstören. Der Händler braucht militärische Unterstützung.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.

traits.locale_text: Die Drukhari dürfen auf keinen Fall ein Raumschiff mit wertvoller Fracht an Bord zerstören. Der Händler braucht militärische Unterstützung.

languages.text: Les Drukharis ne peuvent sous aucun prétexte détruire un croiseur stellaire transportant une cargaison de valeur. Le marchand a besoin d'un soutien militaire.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.

traits.locale_text: Les Drukharis ne peuvent sous aucun prétexte détruire un croiseur stellaire transportant une cargaison de valeur. Le marchand a besoin d'un soutien militaire.

languages.text: Drukharilerin, değerli yük taşıyan bir uçsuz gemisini yok etmesine müsaade edilmemeli. Tüccarların askerî desteğe ihtiyacı var.
languages.original_text: The Drukhari must not be allowed to destroy a voidship carrying valuable cargo. The merchant needs military support.

traits.locale_text: Değerli bir yük taşıyan bir uçsuz gemisinin Drukhari tarafından yok edilmesine müsaade edilmemeli. Tüccarların askerî desteğe ihtiyacı var.
